projectDescription: A website built for the private practice business of Carolina Wellness & Counseling, PLLC located in Wilson, North Carolina.
Shutdown/deallocate Azure Virtual Desktop session hosts, when they're no longer being actively used, to save money on Azure costs.
A PowerShell module to interact with the API for Microsoft Defender ATP for Endpoint.

A PowerShell module to create and maintain a workspace for Windows Sandbox. Allows for downloading necessary files to be installed on the Windows Sandbox VM and creating .wsb config files to setup a Windows Sandbox VM quickly.
My custom PowerShell profiles. Built for both Windows PowerShell (5.1) and PowerShell 6+ (For Windows, macOS, and Linux).
A PowerShell script for downloading videos with youtube-dl, with the intention of expanding to being a full blown module.

A PowerShell module built for automating sending out "password expiration" reminders to users within an Active Directory environment. It's written in both PowerShell and C#, while taking advantage of Microsoft's Graph API for secure authentication and email delivery.
